import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card, Carousel, Accordion, Form, ProgressBar } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function HomePage() { const [statsAnimated, setStatsAnimated] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => { entries.forEach(entry => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { entry.target.classList.add('visible'); if (entry.target.classList.contains('stats-section')) { setStatsAnimated(true); } } }); }); const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.scroll-fade-in'); elements.forEach(el => observer.observe(el)); }, []); return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}

Create, Share, and Analyze Exams with ExamiVana

The easiest way to build professional online exams. Trusted by educators worldwide.

{/* Features Section */}

Powerful Features for Seamless Exams

Everything you need to create, manage, and analyze online assessments.

Easy Exam Creation

Build MCQ exams with customizable questions and options in minutes.

Secure & Reliable

JWT authentication and deadline enforcement ensure exam integrity.

Instant Analytics

Get detailed reports and insights on student performance.

Auto-Grading

Automatic scoring with remarks for quick feedback.

Integrated Chat

Communicate with students during exams for support.

Mobile Friendly

Take exams on any device with responsive design.

 {/* How It Works Section */}

How ExamiVana Works

Get started in three simple steps.

Sign Up

Create your account as a teacher or student.

Create or Join

Teachers build exams; students enter the code to start.

View Results

Auto-grade and analyze performance instantly.

 {/* Partners Section - Added for Trust */}

Trusted by Leading Institutions

 Free $0/month

Unlimited exams, advanced analytics. Enterprise $49/month
Custom solutions for large institutions. {/* FAQ Section - Added for Support */}

Frequently Asked Questions

 How secure is ExamiVana? JWT authentication, encrypted data, and deadline enforcement ensure integrity and privacy. Can I take exams on mobile? Yes, ExamiVana is fully responsive and works seamlessly on mobile and PC devices. What if I miss the deadline? Exams are inaccessible after the deadline, and students will see a message indicating the exam is no longer available. Is there a free trial? Yes, sign up for the Free plan to try basic features with up to 10 exams. {/* Blog/News Section - Added for Updates */}

Latest News & Tips

 New Feature: Advanced Analytics Discover how our latest update enhances exam insights. Tips for Better Exams Learn best practices for creating effective assessments. Upcoming Webinar Join our session on online exam best practices. {/* Newsletter Section */}
